EmailTemplate.name: 201703_Americas_Email_AZBAA_Conference_Reminder_JRD.201702_Americas_Email_AZBAA_
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: RSVP to The Honeywell 757 Experience at AZBAA 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> EVENT ANNOUNCEMENT | AZBAA 2017
INVITATION:
THE HONEYWELL 757 EXPERIENCE
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Connect with Honeywell on March 14 <[[GOOGLE.COM]]> at the 2017 Arizona Business Aviation Association annual luncheon in Phoenix, Arizona at Cutter Aviation's Sky Harbor facility.
As the title sponsor this year, Honeywell will have its Boeing 757 on display and will be demoing its exclusive, KA-band, high-speed connectivity solution, JetWave™.
RSVP today to reserve your spot <[[GOOGLE.COM]]> and get an up close look at Honeywell's Boeing 757 (and its third engine); start a video conference or stream your favorite TV show with us as we demo Jetwave at connection speeds up to 15 Mbps; and talk to one of our experts about our GoDirect in-flight apps designed to understand how you can manage all of your Honeywell products and services in one place.
It's truly an experience you don't want to miss.
RESERVE YOUR <[[GOOGLE.COM]]>SPOT <[[GOOGLE.COM]]> TODAY <[[GOOGLE.COM]]>
Doug Wendt Area Sales Manager Southwestern United States
[DOUG WENDT SIGNATURE]
